about_the_game:
Play The Free Multiplayer Capture The Flag Parkour Game Arcaid

JOIN OUR DISCORD FOR ARCAID STEAM CODES FOR YOU AND YOUR FRIENDS

Engage in the colorful world of Arcaid - a quick-paced multiplayer party title that mixes strategy with a little bit of chaos. For friends and gamers from different parts of the world, Arcaid combines thrilling third-person shooter action with a classic capture-the-flag twist.

Leap, vault, and maneuver through dynamic, colorful arenas with intuitive parkour mechanics. Build your ultimate team or dive solo into the fray against random players, mastering unique character abilities and tactical gameplay. With easy controls to learn and endless fun, Arcaid ensures every match feels like a fresh adventure.

Key Features:

  • Capture the Flag Evolved: Strategic gameplay infused with high-energy parkour and shooter mechanics.

  • Party Play or Solo Battles: Go toe-to-toe with friends or match up with opponents around the world.

  • Unique Skins and Emotes: Represent yourself with various skins and emotes.

  • Dynamic Arenas: Explore ever-changing environments that will keep you on your toes.

  • Community Focused: Regular updates, seasonal events, and community challenges-keep the action alive.

Grab your friends and stake your claim in the high-energy, adrenaline-fueled fun of Arcaid—where every flag captured brings you closer to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 @ 3.1 GHz, Intel Core i5-4590 @ 3.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 460 (2 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB), or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 @ 3.1 GHz, Intel Core i5-4590 @ 3.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 560 (4 GB), Intel ARC A380 (6 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB), or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers
